title: A way to invite a guy to a singleplayergame?

replies.body: No way to do this other than LAN, Multiplayer, or Realms.
replies.body_tagged: No way to do this other than LAN, Multiplayer, or Realms.

replies.body: Not possible unless you live in the same house and/or are using the same wifi.
replies.body_tagged: Not possible unless you live in the same house and/or are using the same wifi.

replies.body:
Open your port 25565, download the minecraft server jar from minecraft.net, create a new folder and run it using a .bat /.cmd file with:
-java -Xmx2G -jar server.jar
PAUSE

Don't forget to rename your server! (from minecraft.server.1.7.10 to server.jar)
look at your IP myip.is and search your world folder in your .minecraft/saves, change the name to world and paste it into your server's folder.
Run your batchfile to start the server!
